name: Historic Harbin
description: Check out this 3.7-km point-to-point trail near Ha'erbin Shi, Heilongjiang. Generally considered an easy route, it takes an average of 57 min to complete. This is a very popular area for running and walking, so you'll likely encounter other people while exploring.

name: East Hulupao
description: Try this 1.8-km loop trail near Daqing, Heilongjiang. Generally considered an easy route, it takes an average of 19 min to complete. This trail is great for birding, running, and walking, and it's unlikely you'll encounter many other people while exploring.

name: Iron Man Wangjinxi Memorial
description: Head out on this 1.1-km loop trail near Daqing, Heilongjiang. Generally considered an easy route, it takes an average of 17 min to complete. This trail is great for walking, and it's unlikely you'll encounter many other people while exploring.
